# Ranchu Japan LLC

Ranchu Japan is a software company for municipalities, enterprises, and store owners.

## Core Pages
- / : Company overview and trust signals
- /solutions/ : Audience-specific solutions
- /services/custom-development/ : Contract software development and DX support
- /services/kuchitoru/ : Product overview for review/MEO operations
- /case-studies/ : Implementation examples
- /company/ : Corporate profile and timeline
- /contact/ : Inquiry form

## Positioning
Most intelligent, most simple.
